about_the_game:
Step back in time to the 1950s and immerse yourself in a chilling tale shrouded in mystery in "Unexpected Visitors." Play as Barbara Clark, a housewife whose picturesque life takes a nightmarish turn when she returns home to find her children and babysitter mysteriously vanished. As the shadows lengthen and the truth unravels, will Barbara's determination be enough to save her family and herself?

Immerse yourself in the 1950s

Immerse yourself in the meticulously recreated setting of the 1950s, complete with its nostalgic charm and underlying tension. Dive into an era where appearances can be deceiving, and where uncovering the truth means peeling back layers of secrecy.

Desperate Search For Answers

Assume the role of Barbara Clark, a woman pushed to the brink as she races against time to unravel the mysteries shrouding her suburban home. Engage in an emotionally charged narrative as you follow Barbara's journey to uncover the truth behind the sudden disappearance of her children and babysitter.

Survive and Outsmart

Navigate a world of escalating fear and tension as you confront the unknown. Hide, distract, and use your environment to evade the lurking dangers that await in the shadows. Outsmart adversaries that will stop at nothing to make you their next victim (even if that means crawling along the walls or ceilings), creating a pulse-pounding atmosphere where each choice matters.

Uncover the Dark Secrets

Embark on a harrowing journey of self-discovery and survival, as Barbara delves deeper into a sinister conspiracy that threatens her very existence. Uncover hidden truths, face the unthinkable, and navigate a series of shocking revelations that will keep you on the edge of your seat.


Are you prepared to navigate the treacherous waters of a 1950s suburban nightmare? Uncover the truth and confront the horrors that await in "Unexpected Visitors." Every choice you make could mean the difference between life and abduction.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game will feature:

Frightening images
Violence
Blood and Gore
Language
